Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03

Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.server

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.server
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    The ClientHandler class processes incoming requests from clients to perform actions like creating, joining, leaving, or reconnecting to a game.
    GameListenerHandlerServer
    This class facilitates communication of GameListener events to the client over a socket connection.
    SocketServer
    The SocketServer class handles incoming network request and spawns a ClientHandler to manage each client connection.
